publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2277 Pauline McNeill: Information Technology and Social Inclusion-That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow City Council Library Services on achieving Â£850,000 funding towards the cost of installing computer technology in every library and providing free internet access for every Glasgow resident from 2002 and believes that initiatives such as this will go a long way to increasing computer literacy amongst young people, the elderly and socially excluded groups.
S1M-2277 Information Technology and Social Inclusion (lodged on 1 October 2001) Trish Godman*
S1M-2277 Information Technology and Social Inclusion (lodged on 1 October 2001) Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2277 Information Technology and Social Inclusion (lodged on 1 October 2001) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2277 Information Technology and Social Inclusion (lodged on 1 October 2001) Johann Lamont*
S1M-2277 Information Technology and Social Inclusion (lodged on 1 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
